com.client.core.datatables.controller

Interface DataTablesController<T,ID>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - entity that will be handled by the datatables, represent one JPA entity.
    ID - the unique identifier of entity T
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataTablesController

    public interface DataTablesController<T,ID>
    Interface for all datatables request handling
